Container.Name: wh-twenty-postgres15
Container.Overview: Based on PostgreSQL 15: PostgresSQL built with "pg_graphql" & "Supabase Wrappers" made for use with Twenty CRM.
Container.Requires: Twenty PostgreSQL requires: - 'chown':ing the storage directory to 1001:1001. (e.g. 'chown -R 1001:1001 /mnt/user/appdata/wh-twenty-postgres15')

Config.Name: PostgreSQL port
Config.Description: The TCP port PostgreSQL listens on.

Config.Name: PostgreSQL storage
Config.Description: The location where PostgreSQL stores its data.

Config.Name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This variable sets the PostgreSQL superuser password.

Config.Name: POSTGRES_USER
Config.Description: This variable creates a superuser and a database with the same name.

Config.Name: POSTGRES_DB
Config.Description: This variable can define a different name for the default database created on the first start.
